title: Spain mulls protecting teenagers from 'digital Wild West'
text: Sofia Christensen February 4, 2026Advertisement Spain plans to ban social media for under‑16s, joining a growing push across Europe after Australia’s crackdown. Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez warns of online "addiction" and "manipulation," promising to hold tech executives accountable and investigate platforms like TikTok, Instagram and Elon Musk’s Grok. Reactions in Spain are mixed, with teens wary and many adults supportive.
